item.description:
"Attempts to undermine the legitimate currency of this country are simply a unique form of domestic terrorism," Anne Tompkins, U.S. Attorney

Liberty Dollar founder Bernard von NotHaus faces a sentence up to 25 years in prison and must forfeit 16,000 pounds of his minted money to the federal government in addition to fines that add up to 1 Million FRNs. Using Liberty Dollars is now "Conspiracy Against the United States of America."

We cannot let them call competing currencies terrorism. We cannot let them arrest those who would try to save us from a failing currency. So, on Saturday the 2nd, bring your gold, bring your silver, bring your Liberty Dollars, and bring your video-cameras. Then we will trade with eachother right at the steps of the Federal Building in Concord.
item.name: Tilting at Windmills with Illegal Money
